definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to step on/to tread on/to wear (shoes)/(slang) to dump (sb)/Taiwan pr. [deng4]

sentences.english: He walked up to the horse and put his foot in the stirrup .
sentences.chinese: 他走到馬的身邊，把腳踏在馬蹬上。

sentences.english: The stirrup leathers rubbed raw patches on his legs.
sentences.chinese: 馬蹬皮帶把他腿上的皮膚擦傷引起疼痛。
